results.rule_description: BigQuery datasets should only be accessible within the organisation
results.impact: Exposure of sensitive data to the public iniernet
results.resolution: Configure access permissions with higher granularity
results.description: Dataset grants access to all authenticated GCP users.

results.rule_description: Kubernetes should have 'Automatic repair' enabled
results.impact: Failing nodes will require manual repair.
results.description: Node pool does not have auto-repair enabled.

results.rule_description: Kubernetes should have 'Automatic upgrade' enabled
results.impact: Nodes will need the cluster master version manually updating
results.description: Node pool does not have auto-upgraade enabled.

results.rule_description: Clusters should have IP aliasing enabled
results.impact: Nodes need a NAT gateway to access local services
results.description: Cluster has IP aliasing disabled.

results.rule_description: Clusters should have IP aliasing enabled
results.impact: Nodes need a NAT gateway to access local services
results.description: Cluster has IP aliasing disabled.

results.rule_description: Master authorized networks should be configured on GKE clusters
results.impact: Unrestricted network access to the master
results.description: Cluster does not have master authorized networks enabled.

results.rule_description: Master authorized networks should be configured on GKE clusters
results.impact: Unrestricted network access to the master
results.description: Cluster does not have master authorized networks enabled.

results.rule_description: Network Policy should be enabled on GKE clusters
results.impact: Unrestricted inter-cluster communication
results.description: Cluster does not have a network policy enabled.

results.impact: Unrestricted inter-cluster communication
results.description: Cluster does not have a network policy enabled.

results.rule_description: Clusters should be set to private
results.impact: Nodes may be exposed to the public internet
results.description: Cluster does not have private nodes.

results.rule_description: Stackdriver Logging should be enabled
results.impact: Visibility will be reduced
results.description: Cluster does not use the logging.googleapis.com/kubernetes StackDriver logging service.

results.impact: Visibility will be reduced

results.impact: Visibility will be reduced
results.description: Cluster does not use the monitoring.googleapis.com/kubernetes StackDriver monitoring service.

results.rule_description: Pod security policy enforcement not defined.
results.impact: Pods could be operating with more permissions than required to be effective
results.resolution: Use security policies for pods to restrict permissions to those needed to be effective
results.description: Cluster pod security policy is not enforced.

results.rule_description: Pod security policy enforcement not defined.
results.impact: Pods could be operating with more permissions than required to be effective
results.resolution: Use security policies for pods to restrict permissions to those needed to be effective
results.description: Cluster pod security policy is not enforced.

results.rule_description: Pod security policy enforcement not defined.
results.impact: Pods could be operating with more permissions than required to be effective
results.resolution: Use security policies for pods to restrict permissions to those needed to be effective
results.description: Cluster pod security policy is not enforced.

results.rule_description: Legacy metadata endpoints enabled.
results.impact: Legacy metadata endpoints don't require metadata headers
results.description: Cluster has legacy metadata endpoints enabled.

results.rule_description: Legacy metadata endpoints enabled.
results.impact: Legacy metadata endpoints don't require metadata headers
results.description: Cluster has legacy metadata endpoints enabled.

results.rule_description: Legacy metadata endpoints enabled.
results.impact: Legacy metadata endpoints don't require metadata headers
results.description: Cluster has legacy metadata endpoints enabled.

results.rule_description: Legacy client authentication methods utilized.
results.impact: Username/password or certificate authentication methods are less secure
results.resolution: Use service account or OAuth for authentication
results.description: Cluster allows the use of basic auth for master authentication.

results.rule_description: GKE Control Plane should not be publicly accessible
results.impact: GKE control plane exposed to public internet
results.resolution: Use private nodes and master authorised networks to prevent exposure
results.description: Cluster exposes control plane to the public internet.

results.rule_description: Node metadata value disables metadata concealment.
results.impact: Metadata that isn't concealed potentially risks leakage of sensitive data
results.resolution: Set node metadata to SECURE or GKE_METADATA_SERVER
results.description: Node pool exposes node metadata.

results.rule_description: Node metadata value disables metadata concealment.
results.impact: Metadata that isn't concealed potentially risks leakage of sensitive data
results.resolution: Set node metadata to SECURE or GKE_METADATA_SERVER
results.description: Cluster exposes node metadata of pools by default.

results.rule_description: Node metadata value disables metadata concealment.
results.impact: Metadata that isn't concealed potentially risks leakage of sensitive data
results.resolution: Set node metadata to SECURE or GKE_METADATA_SERVER
results.description: Cluster exposes node metadata of pools by default.

results.rule_description: Ensure Container-Optimized OS (cos) is used for Kubernetes Engine Clusters Node image
results.impact: COS is the recommended OS image to use on cluster nodes
results.description: Node pool is not using the COS containerd image type.

results.rule_description: Shielded GKE nodes not enabled.
results.impact: Node identity and integrity can't be verified without shielded GKE nodes
results.description: Cluster has shielded nodes disabled.

results.rule_description: Clusters should be configured with Labels
results.impact: Asset management can be limited/more difficult
results.description: Cluster does not use GCE resource labels.

results.rule_description: Clusters should be configured with Labels
results.impact: Asset management can be limited/more difficult
results.description: Cluster does not use GCE resource labels.

results.rule_description: Clusters should be configured with Labels
results.impact: Asset management can be limited/more difficult
results.description: Cluster does not use GCE resource labels.

results.rule_description: Legacy ABAC permissions are enabled.
results.impact: ABAC permissions are less secure than RBAC permissions
results.description: Cluster has legacy ABAC enabled.

results.rule_description: Legacy ABAC permissions are enabled.
results.impact: ABAC permissions are less secure than RBAC permissions
results.description: Cluster has legacy ABAC enabled.

results.rule_description: Checks for service account defined for GKE nodes
results.impact: Service accounts with wide permissions can increase the risk of compromise
results.resolution: Use limited permissions for service accounts to be effective
results.description: Cluster does not override the default service account.

results.rule_description: Checks for service account defined for GKE nodes
results.impact: Service accounts with wide permissions can increase the risk of compromise
results.resolution: Use limited permissions for service accounts to be effective
results.description: Cluster does not override the default service account.

results.rule_description: Checks for service account defined for GKE nodes
results.impact: Service accounts with wide permissions can increase the risk of compromise
results.resolution: Use limited permissions for service accounts to be effective
results.description: Cluster does not override the default service account.

results.rule_description: Cloud DNS should use DNSSEC
results.impact: Unverified DNS responses could lead to man-in-the-middle attacks
results.description: Managed zone does not have DNSSEC enabled.

results.rule_description: Zone signing should not use RSA SHA1
results.impact: Less secure encryption algorithm than others available
results.description: Zone ZSK uses RSA SHA1 for signing.

results.rule_description: KMS keys should be rotated at least every 90 days
results.impact: Exposure is greater if the same keys are used over a long period
results.resolution: Set key rotation period to 90 days
results.description: Key has a rotation period of more than 90 days.

results.rule_description: Roles should not be assigned to default service accounts
results.impact: Violation of principal of least privilege
results.resolution: Use specialised service accounts for specific purposes.
results.description: Role is assigned to a default service account at organisation level.

results.rule_description: Service accounts should not have roles assigned with excessive privileges
results.impact: Cloud account takeover if a resource using a service account is compromised
results.resolution: Limit service account access to minimal required set
results.description: Service account is granted a privileged role.

results.rule_description: IAM granted directly to user.
results.impact: Users shouldn't have permissions granted to them directly
results.resolution: Roles should be granted permissions and assigned to users
results.description: Permissions are granted directly to a user.

results.rule_description: Default network should not be created at project level
results.impact: Exposure of internal infrastructure/services to public internet
results.description: Project has automatic network creation enabled.

results.rule_description: Service accounts should not have roles assigned with excessive privileges
results.impact: Cloud account takeover if a resource using a service account is compromised
results.resolution: Limit service account access to minimal required set
results.description: Service account is granted a privileged role.

results.rule_description: Roles should not be assigned to default service accounts
results.impact: Violation of principal of least privilege
results.resolution: Use specialised service accounts for specific purposes.
results.description: Role is assigned to a default service account at project level.

results.rule_description: Users should not be granted service account access at the project level
results.impact: Privilege escalation, impersonation of any/all services
results.resolution: Provide access at the service-level instead of project-level, if required
results.description: Service account access is granted to a user at project level.

results.rule_description: Users should not be granted service account access at the project level
results.impact: Privilege escalation, impersonation of any/all services
results.resolution: Provide access at the service-level instead of project-level, if required
results.description: Service account access is granted to a user at project level.

results.rule_description: IAM granted directly to user.
results.impact: Users shouldn't have permissions granted to them directly
results.resolution: Roles should be granted permissions and assigned to users
results.description: Permissions are granted directly to a user.

results.rule_description: Enable automated backups to recover from data-loss
results.impact: No recovery of lost or corrupted data
results.description: Database instance does not have backups enabled.

results.rule_description: Enable automated backups to recover from data-loss
results.impact: No recovery of lost or corrupted data
results.description: Database instance does not have backups enabled.

results.rule_description: Enable automated backups to recover from data-loss
results.impact: No recovery of lost or corrupted data
results.description: Database instance does not have backups enabled.

results.rule_description: Temporary file logging should be enabled for all temporary files.
results.impact: Use of temporary files will not be logged
results.resolution: Enable temporary file logging for all files
results.description: Database instance has temporary file logging disabled for files of certain sizes.

results.rule_description: SSL connections to a SQL database instance should be enforced.
results.impact: Intercepted data can be read in transit
results.description: Database instance does not require TLS for all connections.

results.rule_description: SSL connections to a SQL database instance should be enforced.
results.impact: Intercepted data can be read in transit
results.description: Database instance does not require TLS for all connections.

results.impact: Intercepted data can be read in transit
results.description: Database instance does not require TLS for all connections.

results.rule_description: Disable local_infile setting in MySQL
results.impact: Arbitrary files read by attackers when combined with a SQL injection vulnerability.
results.description: Database instance has local file read access enabled.

results.rule_description: Contained database authentication should be disabled
results.impact: Access can be granted without knowledge of the database administrator
results.description: Database instance has contained database authentication enabled.

results.rule_description: Cross-database ownership chaining should be disabled
results.impact: Unintended access to sensitive data
results.description: Database instance has cross database ownership chaining enabled.

results.rule_description: Ensure that Cloud SQL Database Instances are not publicly exposed
results.impact: Public exposure of sensitive data
results.resolution: Remove public access from database instances
results.description: Database instance allows access from the public internet.

results.rule_description: Ensure that Cloud SQL Database Instances are not publicly exposed
results.impact: Public exposure of sensitive data
results.resolution: Remove public access from database instances
results.description: Database instance is granted a public internet address.

results.rule_description: Ensure that logging of checkpoints is enabled.
results.impact: Insufficient diagnostic data.
results.description: Database instance is not configured to log checkpoints.

results.rule_description: Ensure that logging of connections is enabled.
results.impact: Insufficient diagnostic data.
results.description: Database instance is not configured to log connections.

results.rule_description: Ensure that logging of disconnections is enabled.
results.impact: Insufficient diagnostic data.
results.description: Database instance is not configured to log disconnections.

results.rule_description: Ensure that logging of lock waits is enabled.
results.impact: Issues leading to denial of service may not be identified.
results.description: Database instance is not configured to log lock waits.

results.rule_description: Ensure that logging of long statements is disabled.
results.impact: Sensitive data could be exposed in the database logs.
results.resolution: Disable minimum duration statement logging completely
results.description: Database instance is configured to log statements.

results.rule_description: Ensure that Cloud Storage buckets have uniform bucket-level access enabled
results.impact: ACLs are difficult to manage and often lead to incorrect/unintended configurations.
results.resolution: Enable uniform bucket level access to provide a uniform permissioning system.
results.description: Bucket has uniform bucket level access disabled.

results.rule_description: Ensure that Cloud Storage buckets have uniform bucket-level access enabled
results.impact: ACLs are difficult to manage and often lead to incorrect/unintended configurations.
results.resolution: Enable uniform bucket level access to provide a uniform permissioning system.
results.description: Bucket has uniform bucket level access disabled.

results.rule_description: Ensure that Cloud Storage bucket is not anonymously or publicly accessible.
results.impact: Public exposure of sensitive data.
results.resolution: Restrict public access to the bucket.
results.description: Bucket allows public access.

results.rule_description: Ensure that Cloud Storage bucket is not anonymously or publicly accessible.
results.impact: Public exposure of sensitive data.
results.resolution: Restrict public access to the bucket.
results.description: Bucket allows public access.
